alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 8:57PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Prowers and southeastern Kiowa Counties through 1000 PM MDT... At 857 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Bristol, or 11 miles northeast of Lamar, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bristol around 915 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Granada and Hartman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
